name: VMap0
description: A Free low-resolution Vector Map of the whole world

name: Blue Marble
description: A composite of four months of MODIS observations with a spatial resolution (level of detail) of 1 square kilometer per pixel.

name: Fires (Last 24 Hours)
description: Provides MODIS (MODIS Rapid Response Collection) Fires/Hotspots for the past 24 hours. Please visit http://maps.geog.umd.edu/firms/ for more information

name: Fires (Last 48 Hours)
description: Provides MODIS (MODIS Rapid Response Collection) Fires/Hotspots for the past 48 hours. Please visit http://maps.geog.umd.edu/firms/ for more information
